page.title: 15M1 & DUNSTABLE ROAD JUNCTION
page.content: The{M1}is the major road in our square.It flows from London to Leeds , carrying approx. 5330 cars and lorries per hour. The traffic in each direction was about equal although the outside lane south was closed. Roadworks are very frequent around {junction 11}at the moment as this was one of the first sections of{motorway to be built in the early 1960s. On our section there are approx .50% more cars than lorries using the road. The {Dunstable Road}is a major trunk road passing from the centre of Luton to the centre of Dunstable. It is a duel carriageway but has a speed limit of 40 mph because it is situated in an urban area. There is no record of it being built but it is thought to have been an ancient track then a highway.
